easy.users_question: How can I send an email?
easy.label: Click on the "Compose" button at the top of the left sidebar.

easy.users_question: How can I view my starred emails?
easy.label: In the sidebar on the left of the screen, lok for the button with the star icon and `Starred` text.

easy.users_question: How can I delete an email?
easy.label: Hover over the email you want to delete, and click the trash icon that appears at the right side.

easy.users_question: How can I archive an email?
easy.label: Hover over the email you want to archive, and click the archive icon (a small box with a down arrow) that appears on the right side.

easy.users_question: How can I move an email out of the trash?
easy.label: Click on the email you want to delete to open it. At the top of the page click the "Move to" button with the folder icon and select the destination folder.

easy.users_question: How can I refresh my email list?
easy.label: Click the refresh icon button at the top of your inbox page.

easy.users_question: How can I check my spam folder?
easy.label: You're already on the Spam page. Here you can view all the emails marked as spam.

easy.users_question: How can I send an email from here?
easy.label: Click on the "Compose" button at the top of the left sidebar.

easy.users_question: How can I see my draft emails?
easy.label: At the middle of the left sidebar click on "Drafts."

easy.users_question: How do I return to the inbox?
easy.label: Click on the "Inbox" option at the top of the left sidebar.
